plot outline: Three reality show hosts get into financial trouble with a local dangerous money launderer. To solve their money problem, they plot to rob a bank. Their financial trouble is doubled by the love interest of one of the show hosts. The female lead is the daughter of a rich man who hands over his assets with a banker in the hope that he makes proper investments for his daughter but get cheated. The protagonist who is the love interest of the heroine plots to rob the same bank from where her father was cheated in order to recover what her father had lost. All triggering a series of comical incidences.
title: Kaanchaana
plot: Three reality show hosts get into financial trouble with a local dangerous money launderer. To solve their money problem, they plot to rob a bank.
